Version 2.0.2 (SOLN-2399)

- SOLN-2399: adds app.manifest to files modified by patternReplace
- Bug fix: FAST-15564: fixing start.sh for new node-npm errors

========================================================================================================

Version 2.0.1 (FAST-12353)

-Bug fix: FAST-12353: fix rsync args so that deploy_local_app clobbers changes in the destination

========================================================================================================

Version 2.0.0 (INFRA-8984)

- Add new parameter "--withsample" to remove/reserve eventgen samples

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.65 (FAST-11345)

- Bug fix: Pinned down version of urllib3==1.23 to address https://github.com/urllib3/urllib3/issues/1456

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.64 (FAST-11172)

- Bug fix: default local folder name for package with no Eventgen sample should be "no-sample"

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.63 (INFRA-7146)

- Enable build of lerna based projects using monorepo

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.62 (FAST-9379)

- move artifactory and artifactory_tool dependency to ext-grunt-basebuild

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.61 (FAST-10026)

- pip install via https

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.60 (Bugfix FAST-9379)

- Remove "--no-use-wheel" which is removed in pip 10. Use wheel package.

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.59

- use specified index_url to install app-sample-removal

=========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.58

- pin down flake8 version, the latest version throws a configparser porting error in docker.

=========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.57

- allow publish in the branch (migration/*)

=========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.56 ( Task FAST-7183)

- Whitelist 'master' & 'merge' branches to enable publishing

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.55 ( Enhance INFRA-1866)

- Add new arguments "--nosample" for eventgen sample removal

=========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.54 ( Enhance INFRA-2884)

- Add new arguments "--publish_target" and "--new_app_folder" for "grunt publish"

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.53 ( Bugfix FAST-6827)

- Make artifactory_tool version configurable

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.52 ( Bugfix APPSC-2384)

- Allow exclusions in compress task

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.51 ( Bugfix APPSC-2372)

- Fix publish issue for branches prefixed with 'task/'

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.50

- Publish artifacts from PR builds

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.49 ( Enhance APPSC-2313)

- Enable ui components to copy package.json as part of built package

Version 1.0.48 ( Enhance APPSC-2324)

- Change from bower install to bower update

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.47 ( Enhance APPSC-2227)

- Support publishing packages from all standard branches

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.46 ( Enhance APPLAT-290)

- Package common component lib packages

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.45 ( Bugfix APPLAT-296)

- Fix file permission issue. Permission changes for SplunkBase validation will be addressed in project

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.43 ( Enhance APPSC-2099)

- Expanded the search to identify the artifactory path based on current usage patterns.
- Fixed indentation issues in code.

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.42 ( Enhance APPSC-2099)

- Standardize the Artifactory path for 'develop' and 'release' branches

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.41 ( Enhance APPSC-2027)

- Use time-grunt instead of ext-time-grunt as now time-grunt switch to display local time

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.40 ( Bugfix APPSC-270)

- Added option to exclude uglify and babel from the offline build target
- Fixed bug related to refresh_deps flag not working.
- Fixed bug related to branchpath not being overridden.

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.38 ( Bugfix APPSC-1882)

- Add functionality to install a list of files only if an install_test_files flag is set

=========================================================================================================

- Add functionality to install a list of files only if an install_test_files flag is set

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.37 ( Bugfix APPSC-1874)

- Adding a clean step at the end of deployapp. At the moment it's not respecting the STAGE=0 setting

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.36 ( Bugfix APPSC-1902)

- Add six as a requirement for installing the artifactory_tool

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.35 ( Enhancement APPSC-1837)

- Remove extend from requirements to slightly speed up build

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.34 ( Enhancement APPSC-768,APPSC-1684 )

- Deprecate artifacts.conf file
- Added 'pkgname' task which publishes package name
- Removed app-common plugins out of ext-grunt-basebuild into ext-grunt-codehealth-tools

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.33 ( Enhancement APPSC-1471 )

- Cleanup and simplify artifactory functions

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.32 ( Enhancement (APPSC-1150 )

- Process dev requirements.txt if exists
- Removed controllers dir copy

Version 1.0.31 - Bugfix (APPSC-1251)

- Option to exclude unwanted files from package

=========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.30 - Bugfix (APPSC-1108)

- Addresses build failure caused during installation of pypi modules in offline mode

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.29 - Bugfix (APPSC-1156, APPSC-970)

- Added api's requirements.txt file in build.
- Added canned asset json file copy in build.

=========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.28 - Bugfix (APPSC-476)
- Change Execution time from UTC format to LocalTime

=========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.27 - Bugfix (APPSC-1059,APPSC-1073)

- Force build to fail if source file does not exist.
- Better messaging when splunk_home is not configured

========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.26 - Bugfix (APPSC-1151)

- Removed sc-build scp configuration out.

=========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.25 - Bugfix

- Eslint maxlen rule change


==========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.24 - Enhancement

- Upgraded and added all the ESlint dependencies
- Added .eslintrc file for Apps to extend from. Also helps with setting up linter with any Editor

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.23 - Bug fix

- Fixed bug to allow root users to install bower packages

==========================================================================================================
Version 1.0.22 - Enhancement

- Artifactory path is now configurable through command line

Version 1.0.21 - Bug fix

- Fixed bug related to empty branchpath value

Version 1.0.20 - Enhancement

- API sample app: use lib/app_common/$app folder

- Enable uncompression of zip file for windows builds

- Enable offline build mode

Version 1.0.15 - Enhancements

- By default, npm run test will now output a test_result.xml file

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.14 - Bug fix

- Remove requirejs from generate_app target, APPSC-1004
- Adding to run_jasmine_tests script in order to kill phantomjs ghost processes

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.13 - Bug fix

- Added the grunt-http plugin which was deleted in cleanup

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.12 - Enhancements

- Add shell script (shell:run_jasmine_tests) to execute jastest (Jasmine test running/results parsing python module)
- Updated package.json to include phantomjs-prebuilt

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.10 - Enhancements

- Add ability to specify python module dependencies in the ext-grunt-basebuild package - APPSC-947

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.9 - Enhancements

- added option to use system rsync command

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.8 - Enhancements

Summary
- splunk_home and remote host id can be specified in Gruntfile.js as well.
- rsync operation to deploy app in splunk displays lists the files being deployed.
- localconfig flag used to override local configurations is set to true by default.

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.7 - Bug fix

Summary
- Bug fix for option variable not being set correctly

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.6 - Bug fixs

Summary
- Fixed apps path in splunkhome

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.5 - Bug fixs

Summary
- Fixed bug where local copy of file was deleted when trying download file from sc/ta-build servers but failed
because connection could not be established - APPSC-944

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.4 - Enhancements

Summary
- Made the option to override build configurations more flexible - APPSC-941

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.3 - Enhancements

Summary
- Script for ESlint
- ESformatter for JS formatting
- Flake8 for python linting
- yapf for python formatting

==========================================================================================================

Version 1.0.2 - Enhancements

Summary
- Upgraded grunt-contrib-compress version that fixes,
https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-compress/issues/177

============================================================================================================

Version 1.0.1 - Enhancements

Summary
- Moved grunt dependency from devDependencies to dependencies

Version 1.0.0 - Enhancements

Summary
- Upgraded to grunt 1.0.0
- Removed unused dependencies

============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.16 - Enhancements

Summary
- Added support to deploy the app to remote splunk instance. APPSC-905.

============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.15 - Enhancements

Summary
- Removed pypi_modules copy files. Added ac-tool in app.

============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.14 - Enhancements

Summary
- Added task to deploy an app into splunk instance, APPSC-880

============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.13 - Enhancements

Summary
- Optionally process requirements.txt, APPSC-678

============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.12 - Enhancements

Summary
- Copied all files from API resources folder for ac-tool

============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.11 - Enhancements

Summary
- Deleted sc-build login credentials which was used to publish shared components documentation.
- Masked artifactory credentials
- Added support for pre-publish hook
- Fixed bug in serverpull task where uncompress option was not working.

===============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.10 - Enhancements

- in develop mode, keep stage and artifacts when re-do build

===============================================================================================================
Version 0.1.9 - Enhancements

Enhancements done in version 0.1.9

===============================================================================================================
Summary
-added api component builds
-removed the dependency of secret.json for component builds
-simplified use of package.json/ bower.json for component builds

===============================================================================================================
Version 0.1.8 - Bugs

Bugs fixed in version 0.1.8

===============================================================================================================
Summary
-Fixed regression in grunt publish task for Common Component.
-Simplified dependency determination by reading them from configuration files(bower.json, artifacts.conf etc)
 instead of listing them in build.json file.

===============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.7 - New Release

Enhancement in version 0.1.7

===============================================================================================================
Summary
-Created a seperate class for Application Suites like ITSI to handle tasks specific to Application Suites.

===============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.6 - New Release

Enhancements and bug fixes in version 0.1.6

===============================================================================================================
Summary
-Ability to pull artifacts from sc-build and ta-build servers.
-Ability to configure file permissions.
-Ability to exclude artifacts during tar operation.
-Simplify copy operation and make it configurable with the option to exclude --files/folders during copy.
-Unify task for creating configuration files for different types of apps.
-Unify grunt compress task for shared component w.r.t the rest of the apps.
-Make type parameter in build.json as optional.

===============================================================================================================


Version 0.1.5 - Bugs

Bugs fixed in version 0.1.5

===============================================================================================================
Summary
-Moved depenedency management from projects to ext-gruntbasebuild. Requires npm v3.x.x and node 5.4.0

===============================================================================================================

Version 0.1.3 - Bugs
====================

Bugs fixed in version 0.1.3

===============================================================================================================
Summary
-Refactored code for task 'create_sample_app' to implement it in class CommonComponent.
-Made bower install as part of build task.

===============================================================================================================
